idAbs.para: Extracts the contents of a layer or map package into a specified folder.

summary.para: Extracts the contents of a layer or map package into a specified folder.

pythonReference.para: The input package that will be extracted.

dialogReference.para: The input package that will be extracted.

pythonReference.para: The output folder that will contain the contents of the package.

dialogReference.para: The output folder that will contain the contents of the package.

bullet_item.para: Extract Package allows you to specify the output folder that you would like to extract the contents of your package to. Right clicking a package and selecting Unpack will unpack your package to C:\Documents and Settings\<username>\My Documents\ArcGIS\Packages
If an existing folder is specified as the output folder, all exitsing content will be deleted and replaced with the content of the package.

scriptExample.title: Extract Package Example (Python Window)
scriptExample.para: The following python window script demonstartes how to use the Extract Package tool in immeduiate mode.
